remarks: Property of a prime ideal in a commutative ring.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 17-Jun-2011.)
statement:
ispridlc.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ispridlc.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
ispridlc.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
pridlc2 $p |- ( ( ( R e. CRingOps /\ P e. ( PrIdl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. ( X \ P ) /\ B e. X /\ ( A H B ) e. P ) ) -> B e. P ) $.
